## ClaimConditionFactory.newClaimPhase() method

Creates a new claim 'phase' with its own set of claim conditions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newClaimPhase({ startTime, maxQuantity, maxQuantityPerTransaction, }: {
        startTime: Date | number;
        maxQuantity?: BigNumberish;
        maxQuantityPerTransaction?: BigNumberish;
    }): ClaimConditionPhase;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { startTime, maxQuantity, maxQuantityPerTransaction, } | { startTime: Date \| number; maxQuantity?: BigNumberish; maxQuantityPerTransaction?: BigNumberish; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

ClaimConditionPhase

- The claim condition builder.
